role.argrole: thing which is produced in abundance in arg0

example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 然而)) (PP-LOC (P 在) (LCP (NP (DNP (NP (PU 「) (NP (NN 农业)) (NP-PN (NR 台湾)) (PU 」)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 殖民) (NN 定位))) (LC 下))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (NP-PN (NR 日本)) (NP (NN 政府))) (VP (PP-DIR (P 对) (NP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 盛产) (NP-OBJ (NN 糖) (CC 与) (NN 米)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 西部) (NN 平原)))) (PU ，) (ADVP (AD 基本上)) (VP (VC 是) (VP (ADVP (AD 一体)) (VP (VV 对待))))))
